name: TatvaSoft
overview:
TatvaSoft is an India based software development company. We have developed our business in leading markets like The US, The Netherlands, Denmark, and Australia, with a development center in India. We consistently practice delivering scalable software development solutions that are precise to client requirements and specifications and are deployed on time with topnotch quality yet reasonably low prices. Our global software development model makes us a client driven business as we strive to produce the best for our clients and help automate their businesses through our software solutions.

TatvaSoft provides software development services to clients all across the globe. Our services include desktop and web based software development, custom application development, software migration, legacy application maintenance, and offshore development center for outsourcing software development.

We have our technical expertise in desktop software and web application development in .NET technologies, PHP frameworks, and RIA platforms like Silverlight and Flex. We develop mobile apps as well for iPhone, Android, and Windows mobiles. Other than these software solutions TatvaSoft also offers business infrastructure solutions in Microsoft SharePoint Serve and BizTalk Server.
